channel.title: class on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in class on Memo Tut

item.title: That Python code has no classes...
item.description: ### This is the second day article of PythonAdventCalendar2019. Write common mistakes. Many methods are defined, but no class is defined. I had a source with a lot of methods and a lot of functionality. There was a person who said that there is no problem with software that Python works as a function. If you don’t create useless instances, you wonder why there are none, I said "why doesn't this source have a class?
